tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ConservationResearchData (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT,
  experiment_date DATE,
  experiment_location STRING,
  water_usage DECIMAL,
  results TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Experiments (
	experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	researcher_id INT,
	experiment_date DATE,
	methodology TEXT,
	result TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Experiment (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT,
  experiment_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researcher(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Observation (
  observation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT,
  observation_date DATE,
  observation_result TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES Experiment(experiment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
	experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	researcher_id INT,
	experiment_date TIMESTAMP,
	location VARCHAR(50),
	result TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE field_studies (
	study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	researcher_id INT,
	study_date DATE,
	location VARCHAR(50),
	observations TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_analysis (
	analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	experiment_id INT,
	analysis_date DATE,
	method VARCHAR(50),
	result TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiments(experiment_id)
);}

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    experiment_title TEXT,
    experiment_date DATE,
    experiment_results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE field_studies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    study_location TEXT,
    study_date DATE,
    study_results TEXT
);
